# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = []
    current_line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= word * " "
    end

    push!(lines, current_line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage
wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent commodo, lorem eu dapibus dolor, a bibendum justo luctus et, mollis mauris. Nunc imperdiet, justo a bibendum bibendum, magna mauris aliquet magna, vel ullamcorper massa arcu vel enim. Donec eget mauris vitae odio bibendum tristique. Sed auctor, magna eget fringilla laoreet, ex quam euismod sapien, non blandit mi mi non mauris.", 15)
```

Output:

```
Donec eget mauris vitae odio bibendum tristique.
Sed auctor, magna eget fringilla laoreet, ex quam euismod sapien, non blandit mi mi non mauris."
```
